mapper.select:
select mail.mail_number_id, mail.mail_account, date_format(mail.mail_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as mailCreateTime, mail.mail_type, mail.mail_user_name, mail.status from aoa_mailnumber as mail
and mail_num_user_id = #{userId}
select t.type_id, t.type_name from aoa_type_list t where t.type_model = 'aoa_mailnumber'
select s.status_id, s.status_name from aoa_status_list s where s.status_model = 'aoa_mailnumber'

select u.user_id, u.eamil, u.user_name from aoa_user u
and u.user_id != #{userId}
